name: VrinGate Earth
description:
Travel & Meet & Share!

VG Earth utilizes geo-data of Earth to connect the metaverse to the real world! 

|| Website: vringate.com || Email: vringate.official@gmail.com ||

======================================================

Donation would be very helpful for us to pay for servers and CDN fee! 

======================================================.

For FREE, you can travel anywhere you want to visit with Vringate Earth! If you currently own a particular place in the real world, you can verify your place and share your products to exhibit your real estate, advertise your business, or simply share your room

Travelers, visitors, customers: You ever felt like traveling all over the world, yet looking at maps isn’t too real? 

  • For FREE, travel to any place on Earth with more immersiveness!
  • Simply enter any actual address in VrinGate Earth, and travel wherever you want to go. 
  • Want to meet up with friends or new people but too lazy to go out? Simply have a chat with others after entering the building. 

Business, real estate, or residence owners: Do you want to promote sales or attendance for your business?

  • For FREE, business, real estate, or residence owners can claim their sites and share 3D content.
  • Small business owners, upload the 3D model of your store interior with items, products, menu, etc., to advertise your business! 
  • Real estate owners, upload the 3D model of your building interior for a virtual house tour after claiming your place,  
  • For Art & gallery owners: upload a 3D model of your artwork for an art exhibition! Let users visit and appreciate the Art you created.
